items.title: Three killed after Russia launches 'massive' attack across Ukraine
items.description: Several regions are without power after missile and drone strikes targeted several cities.

items.title: Screams for help and panic as tourists rescued from fatal Laos ferry disaster
items.description: People scrambled to safety as the ferry sank on the Mekong River, with a local woman and two children feared dead.

items.title: Israel extends order allowing closure of foreign broadcasters
items.description: A bill passed by parliament expands temporary powers introduced during the Gaza war to shutter outlets seen as a security threat.

items.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
items.description: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

items.title: Trump says US will keep or sell oil seized from Venezuela
items.description: The US president also says the US intends to keep the tankers it has intercepted off the coast of Venezuela.
